task.title: How to Register and Prepare for a Fitness Assessment
task.shortdesc: If you have decided to complete a fitness assessment, you need to first register and pay online. There are also a few things you should keep in mind when preparing for your fitness assessment.

step.cmd: Visit the online rec sports portal and click on "olympic lifting and bod pod testing."
If you want to complete the BOD POD assessment, click on "bod pod." Then, click on "add to cart."
Click "checkout." When it asks you "are you sure?," click "checkout" again.
Fill out your payment information by following the online prompt.
If you want to complete the advanced fitness assessment, click on "fitness assessment- full fitness assessment." Then, click on "add to cart."
Click "checkout." When it asks "are you sure?," click "checkout" again.
Fill out your payment information by following the online prompt.

step.note: Once you have registered and paid for an assessment, follow these guidelines to prepare.
step.cmd: If you are male, wear compression shorts made of polyester and/or Lycra. A swim cap will be provided to you before the assessment.
If you are female, wear either compression shorts and a wire-free sports bra or a bathing suit.
